Deprecated API

Deprecated Classes
com.n9mtq4.console.lib.Console
          Use: new BaseConsole.addGui(com.n9mtq4.console.lib.gui.ConsoleGui)(new GuiJFrame()); 
com.n9mtq4.console.lib.ConsoleLite
          Use: new BaseConsole.addGui(com.n9mtq4.console.lib.gui.ConsoleGui)(new GuiJFrameLite()); 
com.n9mtq4.console.lib.ConsoleNetwork
          Use: new BaseConsole.addGui(com.n9mtq4.console.lib.gui.ConsoleGui)(new GuiSocket()); 
com.n9mtq4.console.lib.TextConsole
          Use: new BaseConsole.addGui(com.n9mtq4.console.lib.gui.ConsoleGui)(new GuiScanner()); 
 

Deprecated Methods
com.n9mtq4.console.lib.ConsoleListener.addToConsole(BaseConsole)
          use BaseConsole.addListener(ConsoleListener) instead. 
com.n9mtq4.console.lib.BaseConsole.getListenerByIndex(int)
          Use BaseConsole.getListener(String) instead (index in array or name). 
com.n9mtq4.console.lib.BaseConsole.getListenerByName(String)
          Use BaseConsole.getListener(String) instead (index in array or name). 
com.n9mtq4.console.lib.BaseConsole.hasGuiAttached()
          Since the new gui system in version 4 this is unnecessary 
com.n9mtq4.console.lib.BaseConsole.initGui()
            
com.n9mtq4.console.lib.managers.PluginManager.loadPluginOLDFORMAT(File, BaseConsole, String)
          Use the new plugin format. TODO: THIS WILL BE REMOVED IN VERSION 5.x.x 
com.n9mtq4.console.lib.gui.ConsoleGui.lowPrint(String, Colour)
          Helper method only meant to be used by 
com.n9mtq4.console.lib.BaseConsole.print(String, Color)
          Use BaseConsole.print(String, Colour) 
com.n9mtq4.console.lib.BaseConsole.println(String, Color)
          Use BaseConsole.println(String, Colour) 
com.n9mtq4.console.lib.utils.ObjectUtils.readSerializableObject(File)
           
com.n9mtq4.console.lib.ConsoleListener.removeFromConsole(BaseConsole)
          use BaseConsole.removeListener(ConsoleListener) instead.
